titleStmt.title: To each gentleman soldier in the company of Captain Robert Gore, Captain in the Orange regiment of trained bands of London
titleStmt.author: Candy, Nathaniel.
Hawkins, Thomas, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Signed by Nathaniel Candy and Thomas Hawkins.
Verse - "In her rich coat the cross and dagger stand:".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
